root.name: Mushiking: King of the Beetles
root.description: Mushiking: King of the Beetles is both an arcade game and a collectible card game, developed by Sega. Players use cards they have collected to engage in combat with each other utilizing various fighting beetle species. Cards come in three types; beetle (base character) cards, power (attack type) cards, or special (extremely rare or obtained through means other than the machine) cards. Cards vary in rarity. The game is very popular in Japan, where over 20,000 official tournaments have been held. Clones have been built with alternate themes and/or different translations. Standalone games have also been released for other platforms, such as DS.
